item.description:
Introduction to Meditation and Christian Mysticism

Every Sunday at 12:30 p.m.

Understanding the laws of the universe isn't easy, which is why the Center of Light offers six sessions that explore the foundations of Christian Mysticism. This class gives an overview of what Christian Mysticism is and what mystics do, and, most importantly, it offers participants a chance to experience the spiritual world first-hand. Open to all, there is no restriction on faith. You only have to believe that there is most likely a power of intelligence that is higher than human intelligence.

This meetup is free.
item.how_to_find_us: We're just around the corner from the Stony Brook T-stop on the orange line.
